meanings: recognize an illegitimate child (as one´s own)
affiliate a child to a parent

examples.korean: a bachelor's baby 발음듣기 사생아. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
a natural child 발음듣기 사생아. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
She was a natural daughter of King James II. 발음듣기 그녀는 제임스 2세의 사생아였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was a natural daughter of King James II. 발음

examples.korean: The label "illegitimate child" followed him wherever he went. 발음듣기 사생아라는 꼬리표가 늘 그를 따라다녔다 Neungyule
examples.english: The label "illegitimate child" followed him wherever he went. 발음

examples.korean: The misbegotten child had no parents. 발음듣기 그 사생아에게는 부모가 없었다. Neungyule
examples.english: The misbegotten child had no parents. 발음
